member.name: STORAGE_DESCRIPTOR_HEADER
member.summary: Used in conjunction with theIOCTL_STORAGE_QUERY_PROPERTY control code to retrieve the properties of a storage device or adapter.

member.name: STORAGE_DESCRIPTOR_HEADER.Version
member.summary: Contains the size of this structure, in bytes. The value of this member will change as members are added to the structure.

member.name: STORAGE_DESCRIPTOR_HEADER.Size
member.summary: Specifies the total size of the data returned, in bytes. This may include data that follows this structure.
